name: NETSTARHOME
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
NETSTAR offers the most comprehensive voice-controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your home lighting and other devices hands free.

Connect NETSTAR HOME with few simple steps

(1). Download our "NETSTAR" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered);
(3). Turn on NETSTAR devices and connect them with “NETSTAR” app;
(4). You can rename the devices with NETSTAR App. So if you rename a smart bulb “Bedroom Light”, then Echo will get that same name after discovered the devices.
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, 
(6) Configure Echo with "Alexa" app.

Then you can enable your skill with below method：

(7). Open Alex app and click on more.
(8). Click on skills and search of "NETSTAR HOME", and you'll be navigated to NETSTAR HOME , click enable to use.
(9). Open "NETSTAR" App, click More Service, choose "Alexa". Link with Verification Code, copy the Code, put code into the login page；
(10). Talk to Echo "“Alexa,discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(11). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.,

Here are the voice commands:

Light Controls:

"Alexa, turn on living room light"
"Alexa, turn off living room light"
"Alexa, dim bedroom light"
"Alexa, brighten bedroom light"
"Alexa, set the office room light to 20 percent"

FAN

Alexa, turn on the fan
Alexa, what is the fan speed?
Alexa,set the fan speed to 3


SMARTPLUG

Alexa, turn on the smart plug
Alexa,turn off the smart plug


SWITCH

Alexa, turn on the switch
Alexa,turn off the switch
